main.name: Stuart Tiedemann
main.description: I program and build websites and web applications of all types.
main.bio: I have a degree in Electrical Engineering Technology(BSEET) and worked as an Electrical Engineer for four years. My main responsibilities involved troubleshooting and programming PLC's and other industrial controls.  I have also worked in finance as a licensed, professional equities trader for twelve years with several different firms and worked from a remote home office for nine years. Currently, I work remotely as a freelance web developer.  I have full-stack exposure but most of my experience and work has been with frontend technologies.  I am experienced with HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, & Angular.

education.description: Developer in 16 Week full- stack Immersive Bootcamp. Spent 70 hours per week learning MEAN and LAMP stacks with a focus on javascript including Node. js. Comfortable with front- end technologies and integration with back-end technologies such as Node. js and PHP. Front-end technology experience includes Sass, HTML, CS3, jQuery, AnglularJs, and bootstrap. Worked on multiple projects that were a combination of independent and paired programming exercises on a daily basis and documented progress through github. Familiar with responsive design, SEO, and site performance.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science Electrical Engineering Technology
education.description: Bachelors degree in an engineering technology field that implements and applies the principles of electrical engineering.EET deals with the design, application, installation, manufacturing, operation and/or maintenance of electrical/electronic(s) systems. EET is a specialized discipline that has more focus on application, theory, and applied design, and implementation.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: Work with Frontend technologies including HTML, CSS, Javascript, and AngularJS.  Responsible for HTML and CSS styling changes for a large corporate site.  Use AngularJS to implement business logic for apps.

work.title: Frontend Web Developer
work.description: Four month contract as Lead UI/Front-End developer on a proprietary search tool application. The project was developed using AngularJS with “Controller As” syntax. Custom services and directives were developedto fulfill the needs of the project including developing an API service to interface with a NodeJS back end. Technologies used in this project were: AngularJS, Javascript, Bootstrap, HTML, SASS, CSS & Webpack

work.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
work.description: Partnered with another developer on a contract to build the worlds first & only marketplace for employers and code schoolers. This project was built using PHP and SQL. Other technologies utilized included Bootstrap, Javascript, HTML, & CSS. Worked on both the Front-End and Back-End.

work.title: Futures Trader
work.description: Used own capital to implement various short-term futures trading strategies

work.title: Proprietary Equities Trader
work.description: Worked in the finance industry for twelve years as an equities trader. This was a self- directed position that was exclusively commission based. Worked independently from a home office and was responsible for the buying and selling of securities. Responsible for a portfolio that averaged $500,000.  Developed trading strategies to take advantage of short-term price movements in equities.

work.title: Electrical Engineer
work.description: Performed troubleshooting and executed programming modifications on an array of PLC types including: Allen- Bradley SLC 500 & PLC-5, Yaskawa CP3300, Automation Direct, and various Omron PLCs.

work.title: Product Specialist
work.description: Provided technical support to inside sales teams and customers on a variety of industrial controls including PID controllers and PLC's.

projects.title: BootcampXchange
projects.description: The world's first & only exclusive marketplace for employers & code schoolers

projects.title: Open Movie Database
projects.description: Use the Open Movie Database API to generate a list of currently playing movies or search for actors and TV shows

projects.title: Hippo Guardian
projects.description: A whimisical site where you can show your love for hippos!

projects.title: Blackjack
projects.description: A blackjack game programmed in javascript

projects.title: Google Maps API
projects.description: Use the Google Maps API to display information about the 40 largest cities in the US and to plot driving directions to/from each location.

projects.title: Yahoo Stocks API
projects.description: Use Yahoo stocks API to retrieve information about your favorite stocks.

testimonials.text: We had the pleasure of working with Stuart on a critical project. He picks up new projects quickly, works well with the team, and puts his heart into his work. We look forward to working with Stuart in the future. I highly recommend him.
